sentences.english: Will we meet our responsibilities or shirk them?
sentences.chinese: 我們是履行自己的責任，還是逃避責任？

sentences.english: None of us can deny these threats or escape responsibility in meeting them.
sentences.chinese: 我們誰也不能否認這些挑戰，或逃避責任不去面對。

sentences.english: Valentine's is a kind of looking for shirking responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 找情人是一種逃避責任的做法。

sentences.english: He is more likely to be evasive and it will be harder to get him to make any firm commitments.
sentences.chinese: 他一般是逃避責任的，很難讓他做出任何堅定的承諾。

sentences.english: To say that we can't do anything about America's drug problem is a cop-out .
sentences.chinese: 說我們對美國的毒品問題無計可施是在逃避責任。

sentences.english: I have never escaped from my responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想過逃避責任。

sentences.english: By using this technique, Humphrys says, Blair is simply evading responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 漢弗萊斯說，布萊爾使用這種伎倆只是爲了逃避責任。

sentences.english: You can't shirk, it's your duty.
sentences.chinese: 你別想逃避責任，這本來就是你的職責。

sentences.english: A responsible man never evades his duties.
sentences.chinese: 一個負責任的人從不逃避責任。

sentences.english: He feigned illness or other incapacity in order to avoid duty .
sentences.chinese: 他裝病或裝作其它形式的無能爲力以逃避責任。

sentences.english: We, as a nation, cannot afford to shirk responsibility any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我們，整個國家，再也無法忍受他們逃避責任了。
